microservices_architecture.description: Clean separation between API, connectors, and database services

github_connector.description: Polls GitHub repositories for pull requests, releases, and workflow runs

gitlab_connector.description: Polls GitLab projects for merge requests, releases, and pipeline runs

kubernetes_connector.description: Monitors Kubernetes clusters for configuration changes including deployments, statefulsets, daemonsets, services, configmaps, secrets, and ingresses

configurable_polling.description: Set poll intervals per connector via environment variables

modular_connectors.description: Enable/disable connectors by commenting services in docker-compose.yml

postgresql_database.description: Centralized PostgreSQL database with JSONB support for flexible data

rest_api.description: Read-only FastAPI service with filtering and statistics endpoints

react_dashboard.description: Real-time dashboard with filtering, auto-refresh, and statistics

flexible_data_model.description: JSONB fields for descriptions supporting related_events and structured data

toast_notifications.description: Custom toast notification system for user feedback with auto-dismiss and manual close

field_visibility_controls.description: Customizable field visibility per connector type to show/hide specific data fields when expanding events

timestamp_filtering.description: Custom date/time picker with calendar dropdown for filtering events by timestamp range
